meanings: [명사] curse, (formal) imprecation, [동사] curse, put a curse (on)

vlive.korean: 저주 받은 아이요? "The Cursed Child?" 듣기 View video AB6IX : 메리 영민스마스🎅🎅❤
저주 거는 거 아닌가요 이거? Isn't this going to be cursed? 듣기 View video AB6IX : AB6IX (에이비식스) ❤HBD WOONG❤
vlive.english: Isn't this going to be cursed?

vlive.korean: 이거... 내가 저주를 똑바로 못했어! This... I didn't make the right curse. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 예로부터 거북목 완치의 지름길은 우리슾구 용안이랬습니다,,(๑≥ロ≤)੭💥⁾⁾ (SF9’s cute curses for fans)
vlive.english: This... I didn't make the right curse.

vlive.korean: 저주 받은 아이... 성물 아니야? "The Cursed Child..." Wasn't it a holy grail? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 메리 영민스마스🎅🎅❤
vlive.english: "The Cursed Child..." Wasn't it a holy grail?

vlive.korean: 그 예전에 그... - 크리스마스의 저주 이런 거? In the past... - "Curses on Christmas?" 듣기 View video AB6IX : 메리 영민스마스🎅🎅❤

examples.korean: The necklace was cursed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 목걸이에는 저주가 서려 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The necklace was cursed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The whole family seemed cursed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 가족 전체가 저주를 받은 것 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The whole family seemed cursed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The family thought that they were under a curse. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 가족은 자신들이 저주를 받았다고 생각했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The family thought that they were under a curse. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Damn you! I’m not going to let you bully me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 저주받을 놈! 네 놈이 나를 못살게 굴도록 놔두지 않을 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Damn you! I’m not going to let you bully me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Legend has it that the whole village had been cursed by a witch. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 전설에 의하면 그 마을 전체가 한 마녀의 저주를 받았던 것으로 되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Legend has it that the whole village had been cursed by a witch. Add to Wordbook
